airframe.name: mercury4
airframe.makefile:
# # CSC # SRC_CSC=csc SRC_BOOZ=booz
FLASH_MODE = ISP LPC21ISP_PORT = /dev/ttyUSB0
LPC21ISP_BAUD = 38400 LPC21ISP_XTAL = 12000
LDSCRIPT=$(SRC_ARCH)/LPC2129-ROM.ld
csc.ARCHDIR = arm7 csc.ARCH = arm7tdmi csc.TARGET = csc csc.TARGETDIR = csc
csc.CFLAGS += -DBOARD_CONFIG=\"csc_board_v1_0.h\" csc.CFLAGS += -DPERIPHERALS_AUTO_INIT csc.srcs += $(SRC_CSC)/csc_me4_main.c
csc.CFLAGS += -DUSE_LED
csc.srcs += sys_time.c $(SRC_ARCH)/sys_time_hw.c $(SRC_ARCH)/armVIC.c csc.CFLAGS += -DPERIODIC_TASK_PERIOD='SYS_TICS_OF_SEC((1./512.))' -DTIME_LED=1
csc.srcs += $(SRC_CSC)/csc_me4_link.c csc.CFLAGS += -DCSC_ME4_LINK_VIC_SLOT=7
# # Overo #
USER = HOST = mercury4 TARGET_DIR = ~
SRC_FMS=fms
overo_test_spi.ARCHDIR = omap overo_test_spi.srcs=$(SRC_FMS)/overo_test_spi.c
overo_test_xsens.ARCHDIR = omap overo_test_xsens.srcs=$(SRC_FMS)/overo_test_xsens.c
